thread.section_title: Hotel Morgana - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (Rome, Italy) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Excellent position
thread.title_full: Excellent position - Review of Hotel Morgana, Rome, Italy - TripAdvisor

author: MadMaxEastbourne
title: Excellent position
text:
This hotel is just 5 minutes walk from the train station and both of Rome's metro lines.
Best described as faded grandeur. The room was old fashioned but the bed very comfortable and the bathroom was always clean with a powerful water supply, great for showering or relaxing in the bath after a long day sightseeing. Bed and towels changed daily. The staff were very helpful and breakfast excellent. Shame that the bar was only opened by request and not well stocked, therefore no chance to chat to other trippers.
